fields.name: Cadbury Dairy Milk (200g)
fields.description: The brightly wrapped delicious Cadbury Roses chocolates, in distinctive blue packs, have been a family favourite in boxed chocolates since 1938.

fields.name: Cadbury Milk Tray
fields.description: This much loved brand was launched in 1915 and has subsequently enjoyed its place in the heart of the nation.

fields.name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Tiffin (200g)
fields.description: A mouth-watering medley of crunchy biscuit and juicy dried grapes, smothered in smooth creamy Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate - a delicious old-school classic!
